node.title: Brendon Palmer
node.text: Very helpful and friendly people to deal with. Made the house buying legal process easy to understand. Highly recommend their services!

node.title: David Hemopo
node.text:
We had the pleasure of having Tamina handle our transaction and provide clear and concise advice in our matters. I was super impressed on her responsiveness to us and her consistent updates with our matter, keeping us in the loop every step of the way. I would recommend her and her team at Evolution Lawyers to handle your business and give you legal advice on your property asset matters.
Thanks a lot

node.title: Edward Pattinson
node.text: Tamina and her team pulled out all the stops to ensure that we met our settlement date. We cannot thank them enough and definitely recommend Evolution Lawyers if you are seeking legal advice and support when buying house.

node.title: Brett Lysaght
node.text:
Thomas Bloy,
Recently successfully negotiated a settlement to a long-standing legal claim, I have been impressed by both his legal knowledge and negotiating skills.
He has also efficiently sorted out legal and accounting problems that have been plaguing my Company and Family Trust for some time.
Most importantly, I have absolute faith in Thomas's honesty and integrity.
I would recommend Evolution Lawyers services to anybody.

node.title: Maurice Buckley
node.text:
I heard Thomas talk about Evolution Lawyers at a TNG meeting I was impressed with what he said and asked him to assist me with a serious bankruptcy matter, I gave him all of the information he quickly got to grips with the situation, represented me in the High Court, he then skillfully negotiated with the other party and achieved an amazing settlement, which has now been concluded
I cannot recommend highly enough and will be referring clients in the future

node.title: Veronica Salua
node.text: Efficient, professional, knowledgeable, superb team work and an understanding law firm! They made our process of first home buyers as seamless as possible. Lindy and Kieran were so easy to work with, they took all our stress and worries away. Every advice was on point and were very reassuring. Highly recommend!!

node.title: Patira Siueva
node.text:
I highly recommend Tamina. She provided excellent service and advice to me and my family.  I was able to relate easily to her on all levels - whanau wise and culture wise. She is personable and really knew her stuff and wanted to get the best outcome for us. We are really happy with the result..
We are definitely choosing Evolution to represent us again on any future legal matters.

node.title: j Scheepers
node.text:
Excellent service.  Buying your first house are very stressful.   Untill we meet the team at Evolution.
They took  all the stress out of buying a house .  Highly recommended.   Lindy was awsome,  on top of what need to be done and made the process so much easier.
Kieran made sure to explain all the documentation.

Love dealing with you.

node.title: jiamoru Jia
node.text:
This is the first time to work with Evolution team. Highly recommended as the experience was awesome.

Huge thanks to Lindy as she is such a great person to work with professionally and personally. If you would like to get your matter sorted out with the result you want please call Lindy or her team.

Big thanks to Kieran and Georgia as well as I was also pleased having some email correspondence and video connection with them.

Lindy, thank you and your team so much :) Sophia

node.title: Tracey Stewart
node.text: Evolution Lawyers have been an absolute pleasure to work with.  Our New Build home and our first in NZ was managed with professionalism, understanding, compassion and just an all round excellent experience.  Kieran Boyle and Lindy Van Eck provided an awesome service and I can’t thank them enough for what would normally be a stressful time this was not the case for us it was such a smooth process.  They were always happy to answer any of our questions or concerns.  Thanks Team, Merry Christmas and we wish you all a prosperous New Year in 2022.

node.title: Esteban Balvin
node.text: Evolution Lawyers made my settlement very smooth and easy, they took care of all the details and updated me with all the information required. Good communication and professionalism. Recommended

node.title: Alysia Hing
node.text: Tamina from Evolution Lawyers was awesome to deal with. She was always quick to respond and explained things in a really simple way for us to understand. We found her very knowledgeable and was upfront on our options in case something didn't work out. Thanks Tamina.

node.title: Christy Beth
node.text: Lindy was amazing to deal with! Such a super star, always responsive and super helpful. Couldn’t recommend highly enough!

node.title: ISOBELLE SIONE
node.text: I had a case where I was looking around for a family member who was not mobile. Another lawyer put it in the too hard basket, but Evolution Law heard me out. I can not say enough about the great experience I had with Evolution Law.  Lindy worked on my case, I felt heard, and she went back to make sure she could help.  I was so happy they could take on our case. She kept me informed the whole way through and never made me feel like she was too busy even though I know they are busy.  She pulled out all the stops.  LINDY You are a star, you helped when I thought it was not possible! Thank you for everything and your wonderful team for helping my brother and I out.  Your help has actually helped more than just the two of us.  I am truly grateful for your help. Thank you.

node.title: Stevan Tedianto
node.text: In our property buying experience, George from Evolution Lawyers has been absolutely fantastic, always picking up the phone and explaining some confusing points we encountered. The firm will definitely be our first choice when it comes to conveyancing. I would absolutely recommend them!

node.title: julia Woodhouse
node.text:
I am very impressed with this law firm.

My first contact has been my Will. Tamina is delightful and very astute. I have never met her, but our first and detailed phone  conversation was enough to make me feel comfortable and in safe hands.

Tamina quickly understood what I needed and promptly sent me the extra clauses needed. The Will is now completed.  She is empathetic, polite and clearly loves her work.

I will be using Evolution Lawyers  for any future work I need done. Thank you Tamina.

node.title: Pastor Ri
node.text: I have dealt with Evolution Lawyers previously and while everything was completed it was a slower experience. I dealt with them again now with a new Solicitor Samuel Chand. Sam was always helpful, always easy to get hold of by email, phone or text and my actions were completed on time.
